clean_content:
Definition / general

* Lined by indigenous mucosa of segment it is duplicating

Case reports

* Newborn with cyst containing gastrointestinal and respiratory epithelium ([Arch Pathol Lab Med 1989;113:1301](2684092))* Six infants with cysts of anterior tongue ([Arch Otolaryngol Head Neck Surg 2001;127:1484](11735820))* 7 year old girl with enteric duplication cyst of floor of mouth and base of tongue ([Arch Pathol Lab Med 2000;124:614](10747322))

Treatment

* Excision; may recur if incompletely excised

Clinical images
